description: Router manifest generated from introspecting installed agents and skills

product_documentation.description: PRD, TRD, documentation, and requirements management

agents.name: product-management-orchestrator
agents.purpose: Product lifecycle, requirements gathering, stakeholder alignment, roadmap planning

agents.name: documentation-specialist
agents.purpose: Technical documentation, API docs, guides, and examples

agents.name: api-documentation-specialist
agents.purpose: OpenAPI/Swagger documentation and API design

orchestration.description: High-level coordination, planning, and task decomposition

agents.name: ensemble-orchestrator
agents.purpose: Chief orchestrator for agent mesh coordination, task delegation, conflict resolution

agents.name: tech-lead-orchestrator
agents.purpose: Plan, architect, task breakdown, develop, code-review, test loop with intelligent delegation

agents.name: qa-orchestrator
agents.purpose: Quality assurance orchestration and test coordination

agents.name: infrastructure-orchestrator
agents.purpose: Infrastructure provisioning, configuration management, monitoring, scalability planning

development.description: Code implementation across languages and frameworks

agents.name: frontend-developer
agents.purpose: JS/TS, React, Vue, Angular, Svelte with accessibility and performance optimization

agents.name: backend-developer
agents.purpose: Server-side logic across languages/stacks, clean architecture and boundaries

agents.name: mobile-developer
agents.purpose: Flutter, React Native, native iOS/Android with platform-specific UI patterns

agents.name: infrastructure-developer
agents.purpose: Cloud-agnostic automation: AWS, GCP, Azure, Helm, Kubernetes, Fly.io

quality_testing.description: Code review, testing, debugging, and quality assurance

agents.name: code-reviewer
agents.purpose: Security-enhanced code review with comprehensive DoD enforcement and quality gates

agents.name: test-runner
agents.purpose: Unit and integration test execution with intelligent failure triage and debugging

agents.name: deep-debugger
agents.purpose: Systematic bug recreation, root cause analysis, TDD-based resolution

agents.name: playwright-tester
agents.purpose: E2E tests with Playwright MCP, capture traces and screenshots for regression

infrastructure_build.description: Deployment, CI/CD, releases, and build systems

agents.name: deployment-orchestrator
agents.purpose: Release automation, environment promotion, rollback procedures, zero-downtime deployment

agents.name: build-orchestrator
agents.purpose: CI/CD pipeline optimization, artifact creation, dependency management, build automation

agents.name: release-agent
agents.purpose: Automated release orchestration with quality gates, smoke test integration

agents.name: helm-chart-specialist
agents.purpose: Kubernetes Helm charts (delegates to infrastructure-developer)

git_github.description: Version control, commits, branches, and pull requests

agents.name: git-workflow
agents.purpose: Conventional commits, semantic versioning, git-town integration, best practices

agents.name: github-specialist
agents.purpose: Branch management, PR creation, code review integration, repository operations via gh CLI

utility.description: General support, research, scaffolding, and exploration

agents.name: general-purpose
agents.purpose: Research and analysis for complex investigations, multi-domain analysis, ambiguous scope

agents.name: Explore
agents.purpose: Fast codebase exploration: find files by patterns, search code for keywords

agents.name: Plan
agents.purpose: Software architect agent for designing implementation plans, step-by-step strategy

agents.name: file-creator
agents.purpose: Template-based scaffolding with project conventions

agents.name: context-fetcher
agents.purpose: Pull authoritative references (AgentOS docs, vendor docs via Context7) with version awareness

agents.name: directory-monitor
agents.purpose: Real-time file system surveillance, change detection, automated workflow triggering

agents.name: postgresql-specialist
agents.purpose: PostgreSQL administration, SQL optimization, schema management

agents.name: manager-dashboard-agent
agents.purpose: Collecting, storing, and analyzing team productivity metrics and development analytics

claude_code_help.description: Help with Claude Code features, Agent SDK, and Anthropic API

agents.name: claude-code-guide
agents.purpose: Questions about Claude Code CLI, hooks, slash commands, MCP servers, Agent SDK, Anthropic API

linear.purpose: Linear.app issue management using Linearis CLI with JSON output

vercel.purpose: Vercel platform CLI for frontend deployments, serverless functions, edge network

railway.purpose: Railway platform CLI for service deployment, infrastructure management

supabase.purpose: Supabase CLI for database management, Edge Functions, migrations

flutter.purpose: Flutter SDK for cross-platform development targeting iOS, Android, and Web

nestjs.purpose: NestJS Node.js/TypeScript backend framework with dependency injection

jest.purpose: Execute and generate Jest tests for JavaScript/TypeScript projects

pytest.purpose: Execute and generate pytest tests for Python projects

rspec.purpose: Execute and generate RSpec tests for Ruby/Rails projects

exunit.purpose: Execute and generate ExUnit tests for Elixir projects

xunit.purpose: Execute and generate xUnit tests for C#/.NET projects

playwright-test.purpose: Automated E2E testing and error resolution using Playwright MCP integration

testmo.purpose: Run automated tests and submit results to Testmo

test-detector.purpose: Automatically detect test frameworks in projects

framework-detector.purpose: Multi-signal framework detection with confidence scoring

create-prd.purpose: Create comprehensive Product Requirements Document from product description

create-trd.purpose: Create Technical Requirements Document from existing PRD

refine-prd.purpose: Refine and enhance existing PRD with stakeholder feedback

refine-trd.purpose: Refine and enhance existing TRD with additional detail

implement-trd.purpose: Complete TRD implementation with flexible strategies and state tracking

implement-spec.purpose: Implement speckit task plan using Fortium development framework

release.purpose: Automated release workflow orchestration with quality gates

init-project.purpose: Initialize project with constitution, standards, and docs structure

fold-prompt.purpose: Advanced Claude environment optimization through intelligent context management

sprint-status.purpose: Generate current sprint status report with task completion and blockers

manager-dashboard.purpose: Generate real-time productivity metrics and team analytics dashboard

analyze-product.purpose: Analyze existing brownfield project and generate improvement roadmap

generate-api-docs.purpose: Generate comprehensive OpenAPI/Swagger API documentation from codebase

web-metrics-dashboard.purpose: Generate web performance metrics dashboard with Core Web Vitals

claude-changelog.purpose: Track Claude updates and new features directly from your development environment

short_no_match.description: Short prompts (< 5 words) with no keyword matches - reference conversation context
short_no_match.template: Consider the current conversation context and leverage an expert subagent or specialized skill(s) if they're a good fit for the request, but do not over-delegate if a simple, single-turn response will be sufficient.

agents_only.description: When agents match but no skills - recommend agents with caveat

agents_and_skills.description: When both agents and skills match - recommend both with Task prompt guidance
agents_and_skills.template:
Recommend one of the following subagents be utilized in servicing this request:
{agent_list}

In invoking them, further recommend utilizing the following specialized skill(s): {skill_list}. Ensure the guidance to utilize these skills is explicitly mentioned in the Task prompt.

However, if your assessment based on the full context of the request is that these subagents or skills are not appropriate, do not over- or mis-delegate.

skills_only.description: When skills match but no agents - recommend skills
skills_only.template: Consider utilizing the following specialized skill(s) for this request: {skill_list}. These skills can be invoked directly or passed to a subagent via the Task prompt. However, if your assessment is that these skills are not a good fit, do not force their use.

long_no_match.description: Longer prompts with no keyword matches - generic delegation guidance
long_no_match.template: Leverage expert subagents and specialized skills when they're a good fit, but don't over-delegate if a simple response suffices.

routing_rules.description: Rules for determining when to inject hints
